text: Gotham Girls is an American web cartoon featuring Catwoman, Harley Quinn, Poison Ivy and Batgirl. It is based on Batman: The Animated Series. It aired online from 2000 to 2002. ==Cast== *Adrienne Barbeau as Selina Kyle / Catwoman *Arleen Sorkin as Harleen Quinzel / Harley Quinn *Diane Pershing as Pamela Isley / Poison Ivy *Tara Strong as Barbara Gordon / Batgirl *Bob Hastings as Commissioner James Gordon *Jennifer Hale as Dora Smithy Category:2000 American television series debuts Category:2002 American television series endings Category:2000s LGBT television series Category:American LGBT television programs Category:DC Animated Universe Category:Supervillain television shows Category:Web series
title: Gotham Girls
